item.description:
UCONN HUSKIES CHAMPIONSHIP BASKETBALL - Great Seats at Discount Prices**GIFT CERTIFICATES AVAILABLE

***Get Better Seats To These SOLD OUT Games For Less Money From CTPartyClub.com Than At The Box Office***

Sit In The Reserved CT Party Club Section and join us at the Afterparty to extend the FUN!

Watch the NCAA Champion UCONN MEN and WOMEN HUSKIES drive to another Championship


SAT FEB 18 –NOON - UCONN Men vs Marquette Golden Eagles * SECTION 206 * Advance Ticket Discount – only $40 athttp://www.CTPartyClub.com
Call (860) 386-5151
Advance Tickets are $40 * Tickets at the game are $50 if available
- includes all fees and service charges

MON FEB 27 – 9pm -UCONN Women vs Notre Dame Fighting Irish* SECTION 203 * Advance Ticket Discount – only $35 at http://www.CTPartyClub.com

- includes all fees and service charges

At:

225 Trumbull St
Hartford, CT 06106

SPACE IS VERY LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SEAT TODAY

Reserve your seat www.CTPartyClub.com Call (860) 386-5151
